sources.title: All The Way Boys
sources.description: All the Way Boys 1972 BUD SPENCER - TERENCE HILL

metadata.Plot: The "Trinity" crew makes another modern era film. Plata and Salud are pilots ditching aircraft for insurance money. They wind up crashing for real in the jungles of South America. The plot involves "Mr. Big", who is buying the diamonds from the miners for much too little, and has thugs who keep the price down. Of course, Plata and Salud side with the miners...
metadata.Writer: Giuseppe Colizzi, Barbara Alberti, Amedeo Pagani
metadata.Actors: Terence Hill, Bud Spencer, Reinhard Kolldehoff
